location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant G Hotspur, Commander of the Prince of Wales

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying an application for convoy from Mahomed Jaffer Khan [Muḥammad Ja‘afar Khān], Governor of Bushire, for his ship the Ahmed Shaia. It notes that due to the circumstances (outlined in the letter) the Resident cannot compel the Commander to accept the request, so the call is left to his judgement.
